translations: abbr.阳性症状量表（Scalefor Assessment of Positive Symptoms）；信源接入点系统（Source Access Point System）；蛋白质序列统计分析方法（Statistical Analysis of Protein Sequences）；简化的急性生理评分

sentences.sentence: It drains your energy, fosters guilt, and saps your self-esteem.
sentences.translation: 你的精力耗竭，自尊心削弱，罪恶感加重。

sentences.sentence: The passage of time saps a foundation of the unique energy of its founder.
sentences.translation: 时间的流逝使一个基金会创始人独特的能量逐渐消逝。

sentences.sentence: Our dependence on foreign oil strains family budgets and saps our economy.
sentences.translation: 我们对外国石油的依赖给我们的家庭造成了巨大的负担，使美国经济衰竭。
